title: Fontlab 5.0.4 Question
content:
Upon updating the kern feature in my Opentype font, the 1st/2nd glyph check-boxes in the classes window seem to ’check’ themselves, ignoring the glyph left/right checks I had set up before updating the kern feature.

Anybody else had this happen? Is there something I’m doing wrong?

Thanks for any help in advance.

Charles.
